title: LF Diamond+ Top for competitive Challenger team.
body:
**AnVaro is looking for a Diamond+ Top laner to complete the main roster for a competitive Challenger team.**

_We are currently Challenger 250LP (Rank 9 challenger)._

- Must have Teamspeak 3 / Able to download.
- Must be comfortable on meta champions.
- Clear and working mic & be vocal and confident about calls.
- No toxicity & having maturity is essential.
- Must have a reasonably open schedule or be able to adapt to practice times.
- Would be beneficial if you have high level/competitive team experience, but isn't necessary. 
- Must be available for Tournaments (mostly weekends, you'll be given plenty of notice when a game is scheduled). 
- Have a second contact method apart from the League client (eg. Facebook/Skype/etc..) 

**Add either AnV LittleOyster or AnV Matrix in-game and we can discuss trial times (Won't be checking this post too much, so just add in-game).**

replies.body:
im a diamond 2 support main :D. And I match virtually all of the above requirements. 
IGN: Visions


Just wanted to post this even if u completely disregard it as ive been LF a team for ages
We're looking for a top laner, not a support.
